text: Nguazimɨn itir gumaziba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgha ghaze, “Godɨn nɨghnɨzir maba bar ongani.” Ezɨ nɨghnɨzir kamra bar gumazibar nɨghnɨzibagh afira. Ezɨ me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Godɨn arazir maba kamaghɨn en akakasi, God gavgaviba puvatɨ. Ezɨ an arazir kabara bar gavgavigha, bar gumazibar gavgavim gafira.
